attributes.action: Give independence to Northern ireland, Wales and Scotland.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am writing this petition up because I feel that N.I, Scotland and Wales should all have there own 100% full independence.  All those countries are treated like "second class" compared to England, so how about we give each country independence? It will no doubt work out for the better for everyone!
